original_content:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical link between business operations and technical implementation, responsible for translating complex business requirements into effective system configurations. As a technical business analyst, you will drive the development of innovative solutions that streamline processes and enhance the efficiency of our vehicle configuration systems. By blending your business acumen with technical proficiency, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring our systems accurately reflect evolving business needs and deliver optimal performance.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with cross-functional stakeholders to gather detailed requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques, and ensure comprehensive understanding of business needs
- Translate business requirements into detailed technical configurations within our core [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, and implementing and testing new configurations
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging querying, reporting, and data visualization tools
- Recommend process improvements and system enhancements to streamline operations and increase efficiency through thoughtful configuration changes and the adoption of best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to validate that they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Work in close coordination with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex problems and devise effective solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to effectively liaise with technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and experience in an iterative, collaborative development environment

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming and SQL querying
- Understanding of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) concepts and their practical applications

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a technical business analyst or similar role, with a proven track record of successfully translating business requirements into technical solutions
- Demonstrated experience in the vehicle configuration domain, with a deep understanding of the associated business processes and technical challenges

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working with Agile methodologies and participating in cross-functional, collaborative teams
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems and processes, and the ability to leverage this knowledge to drive continuous improvement

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficient in the use of [mention specific system] for configuration management
- Experienced with data querying and reporting tools, such as SQL and data visualization software
- Comfortable working with project management and collaboration tools, such as Jira, Confluence, and Microsoft Office suite

Work Environment & Expectations:
- This role will be part of a dynamic, cross-functional team that values innovation, continuous learning, and a collaborative spirit
- You will be expected to work closely with business stakeholders, technical teams, and cross-functional partners to ensure seamless integration of business requirements into technical solutions
- A flexible, adaptable, and proactive approach is essential, as you will be navigating a fast-paced, evolving environment and contributing to the development of new processes and configurations

Role Overview:
As a technical business analyst, this role is responsible for bridging the gap between business operations and technical implementation, ensuring that our vehicle configuration systems accurately reflect evolving business needs and deliver optimal performance. By combining your deep understanding of business processes with strong technical capabilities, you will play a pivotal role in developing innovative solutions that streamline operations and enhance efficiency.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with cross-functional stakeholders to thoroughly understand business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and ensure comprehensive alignment
- Translate the documented business requirements into detailed technical configurations within our core [mention specific system] backend, including creating and modifying data mappings, integrations, and system specifications
- Implement and thoroughly test new configurations to validate that they meet the defined requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Analyze existing data and system performance to identify areas for improvement, leveraging querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and optimization opportunities
- Recommend process improvements and system enhancements that leverage configuration changes and industry best practices to streamline operations and increase efficiency
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex challenges and devise effective, data-driven solutions
- Strong communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to effectively liaise with technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and experience in an iterative, collaborative development environment

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming and SQL querying, demonstrating a solid technical foundation
- Understanding of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) concepts and their potential applications in the vehicle configuration domain

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a technical business analyst or similar role, with a proven track record of successfully bridging business requirements and technical solutions
- Demonstrated expertise in the vehicle configuration space, with a deep understanding of the associated business processes and technical challenges

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working with Agile methodologies and participating in cross-functional, collaborative teams
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems and the ability to leverage this knowledge to drive continuous improvement

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficient in the use of [mention specific system] for configuration management and data integration
- Experienced with data querying and reporting tools, such as SQL and data visualization software
- Comfortable working with project management and collaboration tools, such as Jira, Confluence, and Microsoft Office suite

Work Environment & Expectations:
- This role will be part of a dynamic, cross-functional team that values innovation, continuous learning, and a collaborative spirit
- You will be expected to work closely with business stakeholders, technical teams, and cross-functional partners to ensure seamless integration of business requirements into technical solutions
- A flexible, adaptable, and proactive approach is essential, as you will be navigating a fast-paced, evolving environment and contributing to the development of new processes and configurations

Role Overview:
This technical business analyst role is a critical bridge between our business operations and the underlying [mention specific system] configurations that power our vehicle configuration processes. By blending your deep understanding of business requirements with strong technical capabilities, you will play a pivotal role in developing innovative solutions that streamline operations, enhance efficiency, and ensure our systems accurately reflect evolving needs.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with cross-functional stakeholders, including business leaders, subject matter experts, and IT teams, to thoroughly understand business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques, and ensure comprehensive alignment
- Translate the documented business requirements into detailed technical configurations within our core [mention specific system] backend, including creating and modifying data mappings, integrations, and system specifications
- Implement and thoroughly test new configurations to validate that they meet the defined requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Analyze existing data and system performance to identify areas for improvement, leveraging querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and optimization opportunities
- Recommend process improvements and system enhancements that leverage configuration changes and industry best practices to streamline operations and increase efficiency
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex challenges and devise effective, data-driven solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to effectively liaise with technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and experience in an iterative, collaborative development environment

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming and SQL querying, demonstrating a strong technical foundation
- Understanding of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) concepts and their potential applications in the vehicle configuration domain

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a technical business analyst or similar role, with a proven track record of successfully bridging business requirements and technical solutions
- Demonstrated expertise in the vehicle configuration space, with a deep understanding of the associated business processes and technical challenges

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working with Agile methodologies and participating in cross-functional, collaborative teams
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems and the ability to leverage this knowledge to drive continuous improvement

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficient in the use of [mention specific system] for configuration management and data integration
- Experienced with data querying and reporting tools, such as SQL and data visualization software
- Comfortable working with project management and collaboration tools, such as Jira, Confluence, and Microsoft Office suite

Work Environment & Expectations:
- This role will be part of a dynamic, cross-functional team that values innovation, continuous learning, and a collaborative spirit
- You will be expected to work closely with business stakeholders, technical teams, and cross-functional partners to ensure seamless integration of business requirements into technical solutions
- A flexible, adaptable, and proactive approach is essential, as you will be navigating a fast-paced, evolving environment and contributing to the development of new processes and configurations

feedback_history.feedback:
Feedback Channels:
I

Client/Customer Interview feedback:
Feedback 1 : 
Joseph Barr – Candidature was rejected post interview because the client did not have enough hands on coding experience
Anthony David Macpherson  - Candidature was rejected post interview because the client did not have enough hands on coding experience. nternal Interviewers Feedback – did not affect JD since the rejection was more on not to the level of expected Proficiency / Failed coding evaluations
<Refined JD>
Feedback 2
Jyotsana Naidu: Cleared Round 1 and was rejected in Round 2 because she did not have enough Support experience and was a strong coder
Anil Kunche – Cleared 2 rounds of technical interview and was rejected at 3rd round because of the overall personality.

<Redefined JD> Search is still on 

Client Manager/Account Manager Feedback – NIL

Rejected Candidates Feedback – NIL  (All said the interview seemed fairly easy and they did well)


Selected Candidates Feedback – NIL
